content.detailedDescription:
Its unexplainable to us looking at it, we were having a family fireworks show in the yard, my brother took photos of all the fireworks with his phone, in the picture we had been watching a very bright white low to the ground crackling firework on an eight foot plywood table on saw horses. my brother had just snapped the photo when he called a few of us over to show us and asked what the heck we thought it was.. it is baffling. if you look at it you can see a whisk of smoke following it into the spot it was photographed in, and if you look carefully you can see the size of the object correctly pulls at the ambient smoke that was in the air, like it rushed into the photo at just that moment, none of us saw anything but the firework in action on the table, it is a complete mystery as to what and why that showed on the photo when it wasn't there...It was completely out of our visual detection...No sound noticed, nothing...? you tell me..
                                                           kurt...
content.summary: This was something that appeared in a photograph taken 1 minute earlier not seen by eye

content.detailedDescription: I was walking from the store.As i turned the corner they rose out of the woods at the end of the road and got in formation as they flew towards me perfectly level and silently and they stopped for about 5 minutes over the houses across the street from me and took off upward in different paths.I knew it was a ufo automatically. i was excited i lost site when they got to far up
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 1 by 1 they rose from the woods about 10 of them then they flew level towards us stopped and took off upwards on different paths

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 11:30pm i was outside smoking a cigarette when i saw a bright bluish white light fly over my house at a phenomenal speed and turn sharply to the left until it went out of view. as i walked out further into my yard to see if i could get a better view i was completely amazed to see a giant black object moving at a very slow rate of speed. at first i stood mesmerized for about 30 seconds then i became frightened and ran under my porch looking out from different angles to see if i could understand what i was looking at. completely silent.  after approximately one minute after initially see the black object i ran inside to get my phone. when i returned the object was gone. around 30 mins passed when i heard a helicopter pass over my home and when i went back outside i could hear the helicopter behind the woods beside my home. the helicopter remained about 20 to 30 minutes then i didn't hear it anymore.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Small round bright blue light followed by gigantic black boomerang shaped object

content.detailedDescription: My mom took the photo idont know anything
content.summary: My mom took the photo

content.detailedDescription:
Late night fishing down by the that there lake in pennington.

loud bang, followed by hum wow startled.

turn to see object landing behind me, no more than the length of of football field away.

entities depart craft, 2/3 beings. almost grey, seemed to hover over the ground, gonads rominent. aproached nearby sheep that were motionless. beings then returned to craft after around ten minutes. craft shot off apace and darted away. sheep promptly exloded but left no visable trace. 

during the happenings i was left frozen, unable to move.

i did take two pictures, that i am now developing

muchlove

jonjo
content.summary: Big hum bang, object land, startled, amazed, entities around, sheep exploded, left apace

content.detailedDescription: Over the pas few months strange things have happened to me. it all started when i tried to summon a ufo which was successful. but i recently regained a repressed memory or me laying in bed with a grey staring straight at me. and i believe i have been possible abducted, even as a child.
content.summary: I was laying in bed with and et staring at me and i have seen many ufo's

content.detailedDescription: Filmed 2 1-minute segments of something large and apparently machine-like in the sky near my house near phoenix, az with 54x zoom panasonic camcorder.
content.summary: Noticed glowing red starlike object in western sky on christmas eve after dark

content.detailedDescription:
I am submitting the attached photos because i unknowingly captured an odd looking object in the sky when photographing a bird. i was taking pictures at the merritt island national wildlife refuge outside titusville, fl with two friends. ordinarily i wouldn't take a picture of a bird this far away but my friend loves kingfishers and he said he can never seem to get close to one, so we better get one while we can. 

none of us saw anything at the time. when i was reviewing my photos later that day, i saw this odd artifact in two photos taken a second apart. the camera was set on slow continuous shoot. it does not appear on the first two images in this series. it is not on later images, since we got in the car and changed locations. these were taken with a canon dslr d70 camera with a 100-400mm zoom lens with a uv filter. i think the camera was pointed due south. i have uploaded the four original images. the anomaly is on images 2372 and 2373. in 2372, it's just to the right of the bird's right shoulder. in 2373, it's further to the right in the image. i uploaded them directly from the memory card. they have not been altered in any way.
content.summary: Discovered translucent object in photo when reviewing pictures later the same day

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were outside smoking a cigarette and noticed a round cloud-like ring  around the moon just like we saw last night.    while looking at that this star like bright object that looked like a star, it moved, right, center, left, center, up, down in a triangle shape most of the time.  mostly moved left to right and back, then up, down, still in a triangle fashion.  we both observed it long enough to make sure we agreed on what we saw.  i watched it approximately ten minutes, came inside and contacted this website.  as far as i know it is still visible.  we are certain it moved, no blinking lights like an airplane, helicopter, jet, etc. no sound. looked like a star but was definitely moving quickly at times, then slowly in a triangular fashion. i have never seen anything like this before and this is my first, what i believe to be a sighting.  starlike moving quickly as described above.  i am going back outside to see if i observe it again.  my wife came in before me, then i came in about five minutes after and asked her if she had seen what i had and she agreed. it looked exactly like a distant star, bright,no flashing lights,just a constant starlike appearance that moved quickly in the directions that i described before.  i am not under the influence of any medication, alcohol, etc.  i am certain i saw it and my wife was certain she saw it.  it did not scare us and we had no fear.  just sighted this and wanted to report it.  we never lostsight of the object.  thought it was a regular star until it started moving in the directions as i described above.  i know i am repeating myself but want to give the best description i can.  would like to know if anyone else reported this just as i am reporting it.  my wife and i just went back outside to see if it was still there and we both definitely saw the object again.  still starlike but moving somewhat more quickly, no distinct pattern but moved significantly more that before.  my wife thinks she saw a red light flash but i did not observe that.  the time right now is 9:34 pm cst.  will continue to go back outside and observe but its been approximately 30 minutes since we first noticed it and it is in the same place,moving quickly up, then down, right to left as i said before. i cannot seem to describe it any better than i already have. my stepson went outside with my wife and he observed its movement also.  he thinks maybe a satilite but agreed that the starlike object did in fact move.
content.summary: The star like object would be stationary, then moved quickly right, left, up, down, no pattern but definite movement in a triangle sort of configuration

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping at my fiances house where he lives with his parents and i woke up for some reason. my fiance was in bed next to me. i saw it walking towards the bed and it stopped and looked at me. i knew it was an alien because it looked like something i have seen before in my dreams about them. like i said it walked up to the bed and looked at me. i was scared and according to my fiance i screamed which i actual don't remember. he said it woke him up. i don't actually remember him being in bed with me he told me he was. i lost sight of the object when it disappeared. i don't know anything more than this. all i know is that i saw it and it was definitely real.
content.summary: I didn't see a ufo, but i saw an alien. it was grey i am pretty sure and it looked right at me.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming out the front door. there was a greenish blue circle in the lower sky. heading due north about the speed of a plane. it stopped quickly and turned red. then greenish and then red. turned greenish blue again and disappeared going south, there was no turning, just north and then south the speed of a plane. it was not  airplane lights,red or green. this object had large lights. this is my first ufo sighting in 70 years. i have seen many things in my life, but this was the strangest . from my home in southwest austin, it looked like it was over circle-c ranch subdivision in south austin. i am a couple miles north of them. these were full plane size lights not  running lights.
content.summary: Circle blue green then turned red

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My daughter was playing in a softball tournament in clermont one weekend in november. her last game was over around 8 and we were standing at our truck in the parking lot loading up equipment and talking when an object caught my attention because of its movement in the sky. it was a large shaped object that was dark almost blending in with the sky just maybe a shade darker but i could make out some square window like cutouts. it made no noise and it had no lights at all. it just floated across the sky above us and went further away until not visable any longer. when it first caught my eye i immediately told my husband to look. he said he could see something moving and could follow the movement  but couldn't see the details like me cause his eyes are not good. but he did agree with me that he could see it moving and that it had made no noise and didn't have any lights. i knew it wasn't any kind of plane or anything there was just no way. it was long and i didn't see any wings. it was very weird. it wasn't until i was watching a ufo show on tv yesterday where the guy described seeing almost exactly what i had seen that i decided to report my sighting as well.
content.summary: Large dark craft blending in with night sky but still visable

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my back patio which faces south. about 9:30pm or so i was observing the now clear sky after a day of snow.Daily i watch as a habit, the evening sky, watching for meteors. so, i was scanning and stopped as i thought i might have seen the start of one. but, it appeared just of to the west of the most southwestern star of orion(about a pencil width at arms length off that star dew west). i was amazed for a moment then thought oh probably just straight in at me as i had seen a bright orange one do one night, but, this one seemed to be perfectly clearly visible and not fuzzy edged as one may expect a trail to be. then as quickly as it appeared it disappeared without any residue or trace material visible. there was no sound, it appeared to be at an altitude of at least 10 thousand ft' but if it was small may be 6 or 7 thou. the apparent craft  was round and resembled the city dot on a map in size to my eye or 3/16 inch - i'm an old machinist. it was gray to silver with a darker gray dot in the middle. from an old machine heads point of view it was perfectly symmetrical. could have been a big meteor. i thought it worth reporting. i believe in the past on at least two occasions i have seen very odd flights and unexplainable moves then as quick as come go. thanks for your concern as i do not believe in aliens persay. i believe man has risen a number of times technologicly and has discovered he can't get away in space it is to far. now he is coming back wondering but how do i reassimalate. may we have mercy on him and he on us.
content.summary: It appeared suddenly wasthere for 15-18 seconds and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Around 6:45 pm i took my dog for a walk & noticed a very bright big star above the trees to the south. it hovered for about 15 minutes & kept intervaling between  white to red. it was very slowly descending until it was gone out of sight completely.
content.summary: i saw what i thought was a  bright star in the sky but it was extremely bright & big, it was hovering over the trees. it kept changing colors alternating from white to red. it was there for about 15 minutes & then descended down out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: On 1/28 several witnesses noticed a bright star with spikes coming out flashing the spectrum of the rainbow stationary in sky. later after observing it from dusk till dark there were chem trails near it. the next morning the sunrise was unbelievable. caught the object on video. on 1/29 the sky was purple at night. today we noticed object again appearing closer this time. cloudy tonight unlike the last spotting. this time we shook in fear as we noticed there were three of these star like figures formed into a huge triangle. we watched for a while and watched 6 to 7 light objects fly away from the triangle.  the object is currently out there right now. help! i have a video but do not know how to upload.
content.summary: Triangle pulsating lights in sky

content.detailedDescription: After seeing this interesting dot in the sky whilst having a cigarette, i filmed it, it sat in the same spot for around five minutes until it shot into the sky. i recently have been having interesting night experiences including paralysis and weird dreams. after that siting and few nights i now have interesting radiation burns, no idea how since i don't work with radioactive material, all i can remember about how they happened is white lights and fear. i really don't know what i'm doing on this site but a good friend told me about you guys.
content.summary: After seeing this interesting dot in the sky whilst having a cigarette, i filmed it, it sat in the same spot for around five minutes until it shot into the sky. i recently have been having interesting night experiences including paralysis and weird dreams

content.detailedDescription:
I was out back of my apartment taking pictures and thought i saw a flash so i turned my camera the direction and got a picture of something strange not sure but 
it looks like a saucer to me .Put the picture through different light spectrums and there is a big magnetic field around this object in a perfect circle !
content.summary: Grey disk

content.detailedDescription:
Mmy sister n law were on our way to a friends birthday party as we came around the bend we noticed that the sky was lit up up ahead.  we assumed. that it wss just nighttime. construction going on and were very very shocked when we came. closer to see a huge triangular craft hovering over this cow pasture not making any. noise! it had a huge light at the front point that. lit up the whole field and two smaller lights one on each corner. point in the back..It was so large and so low tp the ground. that it blocked out the stars and we could only see the bottom .  we rolled the window down i turned off thr car my sister n law leaned over me from the passengers seat and we both sat there..Dumbstruck!  we were in awe..Then all of a sudden the front light (the brightest one) went out and it was just like boom it was gone..That fast..All of a sudden its like we snapped out pf a trance..But we were both terrified..My sister in law was y
elling at me to go ho !!! i was shaking  bad itk was hard to start the car...We ended up being late for the party  make sense because we left in plenty of time to get there early..We came upon this ufo around 8-8:15pm.  i would love to know what it was that we saw and why..We talk to each other about it.But its very stressful to even think pg telling someone. else..We have and have been laughed at.Ade fun off..So we keep quiet..I'm a christian. and i can't bring myself to tell anyone. at church for fear of being labeled as a nut!  please help if you can..Thanl you!!
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: My sister n law n i were headed to a birthday saw lights ahead thought it was night time contruction. it was a huge black triangular shaped craft. no noise! we stopped looked in awe the lights turned of..And it was gone so fast it was crazy!

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were traveling west bound on avenue 12 going from highway 41 out of fresno,ca to madera,ca sometime between 10pm & 11pm.We were coming up to a railroad crossing so i was slowing down and when i passed a small group of trees i gazed over at the ethenol plant that they had pretty much finished building as i always do when i travel that way,when i noticed something hovering above it. some kind of aircraft that i've never seen before, make a note: i'm ex-military.
 so i get across the tracks, and by the way the ethenol plant sits right on the other side of tracks, and i think to myself did i see what i thought i saw and by that time i was right next to the plant and i looked again and sure as heck was a large triangular shaped object about 100 ft above the plant.
 it only had one of it's sides facing me and there were 3 large bright 
lights and the crazy thing was the lights didn't have a beam of any kind.
 i should also point out that while i was driving my wife and kids were asleep and it was a hot evening of about 80* and my truck didn't have air so the windows were down and i did take into account that i didn't hear any noise what so ever.
 just as i past the plant i glanced up for a 3rd time but this time it was gone, i didn't see it leave not sure were it went for all i know it could have moved itself right above me out of site.
 oh i was doing about 40 mph and the ordeal took place for about 1/16th to 1/8th of a mile, probably more toward the 1/8th mile.
 not sure how tall the plant is but each side of the object was about 3/4 wide as the building was tall. 
 wasn't able to get any photos, but i know what i saw and that's good enough for me.
content.summary: Black triangular shaped, only 1 side facing me/w 3 large bright lights,no beam

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: One night while at a friends we brought up the issue of ufos, i made a quick joke and my friend insured me that i would see one that night. as he said that another friend which lives about a block away called me to stop by his house and discuss things, pretty much hang out. right as i get there we find ourselves in his backyard talking about ufos, entities, and the universe with his younger brother. as we are discussing his younger brother switches the subject not even a sentence or two in the conversation his brother stops in awe and we spot a orange orb some what switching colors and moving across the sky we look at eachother trying to deny the fact that it is there at the same time we comfired it to be a ufo it stopped almost like they heard us. it sits there for a minute or two and just spirals out to a triangle in other words this one orb let out two other orbs in a perfect spiral to the point that we can see the spiral trail. while the triangle stood there it started ejecting what seemed like fireballs to the ground and absorbing them from the distance we were at we could hear the fireballs flaring it was strange. at this point i pull out my phone and try to record the sighting. i stood there taking a good five to seven pictures and recorded about three to four videos. it stops exhaling and inhaling fireballs and spirals back to one orb, it hovers about for a few seconds does a small z and zaps out of the sky to what i'm assuming is a portal right when it disappeared we heard a small sonic boom and seen the trail it left behind. this is were i think this sighting was being watched by not just us but by the government. right after this happened we realized that we were there for more than seven to eight minutes we run inside to inform everyone who was awake and show them the pictures and videos right as i show my friends brother, sister and his mom the pictures they begin to delete and blackout i was left with two videos that were being played with on my phone in front of my eyes. i felt like sharing this story to people that would actually listen and can relate to this phenomena. i feel that you guys have the right equipment to verify the video i have to be real. if you pause at 1-3 seconds you can see a single orb. at 9-10 seconds you can see the triangle spitting fire and an additional maroon orb which the camera caught.
content.summary: Orb appears while talking with friends ejects other orbs drops flames absorbs them and zaps away

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving the mcdonalds in jefferson city mo. (highway 54 at southwest/ellis) at 1806 on jan 26th 2015.  i put the food(went in the get the food) in my truck and noticed a bright white light straight in front of me as i looked out over highway 54.  at first i thought it might be the international space station, but it was too low in the sky.  the sun was just barely visible above the horizon to the west and venus(above the setting sun) was the only other cellestial object in the sky other than the top tip of the sun.

i was frozen in place wondering what this could be, it was as bright as the new hd lights shining in my eyes.  it was a bright orb starlike object hovering at about 15-20 degrees up from where i was standing/viewing.  the center orb was flashing red, blue, green, yellow and white light at a strobe like speed.  out of the center orb there were 3 rays that came out of it, one up to the right, and one to the lower left(the 2 formed a straight line of light.  then there was a third ray of light that went up towards the upper left.  the rays were bright white light

it just hovered there for the 10 minutes i watched it, i was trying to figure out if it could be a satelite, international space station or star, but it was too low.  then i thought about a drone, sky lantern or flare but it never moved.  i thought about a plane with landing lights coming towards me but it never moved.  after the 10 minutes i left to get home and feed my family but i followed it as i drove and could see the object hovering out my drivers window.  i lost the object after i went under the highway 179 overpass.  when i got home i looked for the object again, but the sky was full of stars and crystal clear at that point and i could not see the object.
no others around me going in and out of mcdonalds seemed to see it.

i am still stunned and thinking about what it could be.
content.summary: Witnessed a hovering orb or light that was starlike but too low in the sky to be a star

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving from north west to south east on arizona 93 very clear night i loved over out my truck window and i see boom boom boom 3 lights i roll my window down on my truck door and there is no sound just absolute silence.
content.summary: Very quiet

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my house on the evening of oct. 20, 2014 with my dogs.  i noticed what i thought was a helicopter flying up and down, back and forth se of my house just at treetop level, the trees covering some movement.  i didn't hear any sound, i can always hear them coming or going, we're just south of dover airforce base.  this was about 3 to 4 minutes maybe.  i went in the house and to the bedroom where i could continue watching.  it was still doing the same thing, i wondered why they were flying like that there.  then about when i got tired of watching, about 3 to 4 minutes, a large object flew above the field going from north to south, fairly slow as a helicopter would but not a jet.  the cloud cover was low, the object looked like four glowing afterburners on a jet with a bright white light on either end, it seemed low for a jet and not real fast but slow and not a helicopter,  there was not a sound, and i saw the glow of mist around the red burners.  while i was watching the lights go by, the helicopter thing kept up and down and back and forth, sometimes being obscured by the treetops.  then when the larger object had flown into the clouds towards the south and i no longer saw it, the helicopter lights were gone too.  the helicopter lights were white and blue, the jet thing lights were blazing red like you see on an infared stove, the white lights were ball-like, very bright.  i wondered if what i was seeing was the back end of a jet with the four afterburners and the two lights, one on each wing.  but that close to the house i should have heard something. i was all just odd, not sure what to think of this.
content.summary: First noticed what looked like a helicopter lit up flying in virtical figure eight over the tree tops se of my house, viewed it for 3 or 4 minutes, then i saw a large something with 4 glowing afterburners with a white light on each end go south slow

content.detailedDescription: in the mid-summer of 1992, i had just got out of work, and i drove home, picked up a neighbor friend, and drove out to the pond behind our trailer park.  as soon as i shut off the engine, we both noticed a glowing orb(it seemed to be a round or oval object, but all you could see was an intensely bright, orb shaped light.) at the southern tree line, which is the way the car was facing. we both watched it for several minutes as it hovered, moved several tree widths in both directions, ascended up above the trees, descended just below the tree line and back up again, obviously under intelligent control. it seemed as though it knew we were watching it. after a few minutes of this, we were both taken by surprise when it seemed to shoot directly at us, reaching us in a split second, and instantly blinded us both with an intense bright white light. after just a few seconds, our eyesight seemed to adjust normally as the light disappeared. we got out, but found no sight of it. a similar encounter happened a few nights later at the same location, with some of our other friends as witnesses, which i will submit as a different encounter. i realize this happened a long time ago, and really doesn't help much, but i figured it might as well go on record.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Arrived at pond with friend, witnessed glowing orb hovering at tree line. a few minutes later, it shot toward us, blinding us with bright light.

content.detailedDescription:
Tuesday night  1/27/2015 i was out on my deck at 6:20 pm (i smoke outside) just looking around and through trees across street 3 blinking white and red lights in a row with a red light above them. 
   i watched and lights were blinking and just hovered in same spot, lasted until 6:31 pm and just disappeared. i live in bucks county west of doylestown,pa which has a lot of sightings thank you
content.summary: Flashing  lights in formation hovering for at least 11 mins.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: It was approximately 12:35 pm on october the 7th when i was watching television and i had an immense urge to get up and go outside based on a force that was indescribable if there were a similar word to an intuitive brain response then that would be so.  as i exited the 1st floor balcony door from the sw was a similar shape as a plane being downed in the scale of 2 747 back to back from about a 1/4 miles out with immense 2 beady bright star lighted beams of light that would throw most peoples senses off.  however,  i was well aware there were no airports in the close proximity and the size at the time of the aircraft was to immense.  in complete and utter interest i was forced to stay in the exact spot on the balcony as this ship had gotten closer to my direct line of view.  it was slightly hard to make out what i was at 1st viewing as it looked like a plane in distress from the angle it flew at 30 degrees.  within what seems like a minute closely between the proximity of the highest of tree lines to 750 came a cloaked like a cloud based triangle hoover craft in the dimensions of about 75 yards hovering by at 15mph over the tree line.  the craft had a cylindrical orangey but different cylinder in the middle with no jet turbine.  by all means the technology was extremely advanced to hold such as ship in it's entirety in the air without hovering or jets.  in this area these ufo are commonly spotted for quite some time never down so low.  it was unearthly but the patterns of the lights as it got closer were much more intricate! for further detail as the metallic looking pattern of symmetry i am available for e-mail. this was a 100 percent identified to the most keenest of my abilities!
content.summary: Unearthly extreme upgrade intechnology

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting up in my parent's office, at the top of the house, i have a very strong view through two wide windows out into the sky. i just heard the sound of what can be described as almost whale-like, but i can't describe it.. i've never heard anything like it. in my direct line of sight i then very lucidly saw a low flying object, with an irregular shape, and numerous lights moving around, almost alternating, as it curiously moved on above the tree line.. the shape was not a plane.. i can't describe exactly what i saw.

the closest thing would be a rounder, more dimensional shape.

however, its trajectory and actual flight movement were also irregular. by that, i mean it did not stay at a straight flight path, after it passed my line of sight. it stayed straight for about fifteen seconds, and its actual rate of acceleration was like it was moving, and then stopping, but almost like it was doing both simultaneously. i watched it move past my house, almost as clearly as you'd see a car drive by on the other side of the road, from the perspective of a sidewalk, but about 200 yards away. it then moved very sharply to the left, from its original flight path, and even through the tall trees and the morning darkness, i was still able to very clearly see its lights from about half a mile away. what struck me as most odd was that the position it was in, when i saw the lights at this point, was that if it was an actual aircraft, considering the speed and movements of conventional designs, it would have been long past the point of where it was still at, and it would have made actual flight sounds while moving. from this vantage point, any bypassing aircraft make discernible noise. no noise at all.

after the initial whale-like sound, there was no other indication of its presence other than its material presence, the lights, and its displayed movements.. it was completely silent as it came across like it was slowly hovering.. wow..... i'm posting this while it's still fresh, for my own sake. this is my first sighting when it comes to ufo's, btw. just to clarify for you all.

as i've posted in other parts of the forum, my grandfather was a full-bird colonel in the usaf - i am not a stranger to planes. i grew up around dozens of stories about them, many discussions with my grandpa about the kinds of jets he flew, and had many a subscription to aviation magazines as a teenager. i was very interested in aviation and wanted to be a pilot.

because of this, i've tried my best to be as specific in this reporting as possible.

with most aircraft, there are aircraft navigation, or position lights. as well as anti-collision strobe lights. the closest thing i could say to how the lights alternated would be the rotating beacon, located on the fuselage and the tail of a regular aircraft. however, the positions of the lights were not like a planes, and while most conventional aircraft have several different colored lights; including red, green, and white, this had similar to a rainbow pattern.. up to 8 or 9 different colors. as low as it was, with a regular aircraft, it'd make sense for the landing light to be on, or the taxi light.. but i live many miles from any strips or landing zones. because of the shape, how low it was flying, the alternation of the lights and the displacement of the colors in relation to regular craft, the complete lack of noise, the deviation of regular flight paths and unique movements... i'm reasonably inclined to believe that this in fact was a ufo.

it shape was not that of a banner tow or glider tow aircraft.. or f-15, f-22, f-35 class, or a-10 class.. or any reasonably shaped aircraft..
content.summary: Unlike anything i have ever seen.

content.detailedDescription:
(mystery flaming object falling from sky) somewhere between the minnesotan towns of le sueur and saint peter on january 30, 2015 sometime between 12:05 am and 12:10 am, approximate location:  east of highway 169, possibly east of the minnesota river, north of johnson aggregates quarry and north of the small town of ottawa (le sueur county):  
44 degrees 25 minutes 18.48 seconds
-93 degrees 55 minutes 59.79 seconds
content.summary: Somewhere between the minnesotan towns of le sueur and saint peter on january 30, 2015 sometime between 12:05 am and 12:10 am, approximate location:  east of highway 169, possibly east of the minnesota river

content.detailedDescription: I was outside watching the strange {what i believe to be clouds caused by chem trails)  when two red circular orbes appeared out of thin air.  there movement and over all appearance resembled tad poles swimming playfully but with definite purpose in achieving there destination. after a 9 or 10 foot scamper across the the evening sky disappeared into the chem cloud.  beautiful
content.summary: Red orbs streak evening sky

content.detailedDescription: So i was going to sleep and i decided to take one look outside the window so i opened it and looked around and in the distance i saw a white light i thought maybe it was a star but no there was noise coming from its direction so i was like damn were dead cause i thought it was a falling plane.  so i decided let me get my ipod and take a video but i couldn't get grasp it so when i look out again i see light coming closer and closer when it flies directly over my house i saw a rectangulat shaped object i was like no way it can't be.So immediately i go downstairs tell everyone what i saw and when my sister looks outside she sees the lights i explained in the distance.
content.summary: I was looking outside when i saw a white light in the distant when it came closer light started showing i was trying to reach for my ipod to take video but couldn't find it when i went to look it was flying over my house.
